name: Spooderman The Video Game: II
description:
Spooderman The Video Game: II takes place several years after the original, when Spooderwoman was murdered, Spooderman sets off to get Revenge on Voodm.

Spooderman II offers many more Features than the original such as:
-Spooderman comic inspired Cutscenes!
-3 Different characters to choose from! (More coming soon)
-Brand new Music & SFX!
-New HD graphics!
-4 Different themed worlds filled with brand new Levels!
-Brand new Enemies & Legos!
-A new save feature!

And much more!

Oh, and I have Google+ but who uses that?
